entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
